title: Shots fired at Asaduddin Owaisi’s car in Uttar Pradesh, MP escapes unhurt - The News Minute
content:
1. Shots fired at Asaduddin Owaisi’s car in Uttar Pradesh, MP escapes unhurt  The News Minute
  2. Three-four rounds fired at my vehicle in UP, says Asaduddin Owaisi; seeks independent probe  Times of India
  3. Asaduddin Owaisi says his car fired upon in UP, one suspect arrested  Zee News
  4. UP polls: Shots fired at AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi’s vehicle near Chhajarsi toll plaza, probe underway  Times Now
  5. UP polls: Owaisi says gunshots fired at his car on way back from Meerut, 1 held  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Shots were fired at the vehicle of All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (AIMIM) chief Asaduddin Owaisi in Uttar Pradesh on Thursday, February 3. Speaking to news agency ANI, the Hyderabad Member of Parliament (MP) said, "I was leaving for Delhi after a poll event in Kithaur, Meerut, in Uttar Pradesh. Three to four rounds of bullets were fired upon my vehicle by two people near Chhajarsi toll plaza. They were a total of 3-4 people. Tyres of my vehicle were punctured.
